PageDescription: Organize secure storing and sharing of confidential business information in ONLYOFFICE DocSpace

IdealForDueDiligenceDesc: Use VDR for due diligence, when merging, working on a project with other businesses, or other joint venture that requires access to the shared data.
CompletelyOrganizedDesc: Automatically index and track all content to keep great records and stay organized. Generate a summary report on the room file structure.
HighLevelOfDataSecurityDesc: Enable watermarks, set file lifetime, restrict downloading and copying to protect your sensitive records.
CostEffectiveForAnyBudgetDesc: Pay for admins only and add any number of regular users and guests for free. Benefit from a free Startup plan for small teams. ONLYOFFICE DocSpace is suitable for all businesses, no matter if it's SMB or a big enterprise. Want to get full control over your corporate data? Deploy DocSpace on your private server.
